Interface Player

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AggressivePlayer, BenevolentPlayer, CheaterPlayer, HumanPlayer, RandomPlayer

extends java.io.Serializable
    player abstraction interface

    3.0
    Author:

      • reinforcement

        void reinforcement()
        Distribute the armies of every player among the countries the player owns. The method executes till all the player's armies are distributed.

        driver - main game driver
        attackerCountryNode - attacking country graph node
        defenderCountryNode - defending country graph node
        allOut - all-Out option
        Returns:
        true if attacker occupied the attacked country.
